help: remove the `else` block and move the contents out
    |
769 ~             }
770 +             // Write enough bytes to fill the current chunk.
771 +             //
772 +             // Conversion to usize is safe because we checked that
773 +             // self.num_bytes_remaining_in_current_chunk is lower than
774 +             // n, which is already usize.
775 +             let i = self.num_bytes_remaining_in_current_chunk as usize;
776 +             let num_bytes_written = custom_write(&buf[..i], &mut self.inner, self.settings)?;
777 +             self.num_bytes_remaining_in_current_chunk -= num_bytes_written as u64;
778 + 
779 +             // It's possible that the underlying writer did not
780 +             // write all the bytes.
781 +             if num_bytes_written < i {
782 +                 return Ok(carryover_bytes_written + num_bytes_written);
783 +             } else {
784 +                 // Move the window to look at only the remaining bytes.
785 +                 buf = &buf[i..];
786 + 
787 +                 // Remember for the next iteration that we wrote these bytes.
788 +                 carryover_bytes_written += num_bytes_written;
789 +             }
    |
